div.h5: Please use the helpful buttons below to find information and resources during the statewide COVID-19 school closure. If you need additional assistance please contact us at info@redmondschools.org.

li.a: Redmond School District Board of Directors Selects Dr. Charan Cline for Superintendent

div.p: Making success possible for every student.

p.br: Redmond School District is committed to equal opportunity and non-discrimination in all of its educational and employment activities.

div.p: The District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, religion, disability or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.
The following individuals have been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination:

p.br: Martha Hinman, Executive Director of Student Services | Email | (541) 923-8260

p.strong: District Title VI, Title IX, Age Discrimination & American Disabilities Act Contact:
p.br: Tracie Renwick, Director of Human Resources | Email | (541) 923-8922

div.small: Redmond School District | 145 SE Salmon Dr. | Redmond, Oregon 97756
